headline: Warren Buffett Recently "Came Pretty Close" to Spending $10 Billion On an Acquisition, and I Strongly Believe One of These 2 Companies Was the Target
summary: Two public companies -- one of which is a legal monopoly -- check all the right boxes as potential acquisition targets by the Oracle of Omaha.
